books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: The 54th book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas investigates a homicide and the disappearance of other women who resemble that victim.
books.name: ABANDONED IN DEATH

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Jonathan Kellerman
books.description: The 37th book in the Alex Delaware series. Delaware and Sturgis investigate a double homicide.
books.name: CITY OF THE DEAD

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Ali Hazelwood
books.description: A young professor agrees to pretend to be a third-year Ph.D. candidate’s boyfriend.
books.name: THE LOVE HYPOTHESIS

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: An N.Y.P.D. detective, a hedge fund chief executive and a psychology professor are wrapped up in the disappearance of a college student.
books.name: STEAL

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Nita Prose
books.description: When a wealthy man is found dead in his room, a maid at the Regency Grand Hotel becomes a lead suspect.
books.name: THE MAID

books.author: by Amor Towles
books.description: Two friends who escaped from a juvenile work farm take Emmett Watson on an unexpected journey to New York City in 1954.
books.name: THE LINCOLN HIGHWAY

books.author: by Gregg Hurwitz
books.description: The seventh book in the Orphan X series. Evan Smoak must get inside the fortress of a cartel leader.
books.name: DARK HORSE

books.author: by Elena Armas
books.description: Catalina’s insufferable colleague Aaron agrees to be her fake date to her sister’s wedding.
books.name: THE SPANISH LOVE DECEPTION

books.author: by Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.
books.name: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: Opposites Poppy and Alex meet to vacation together one more time in hopes of saving their relationship.
books.name: PEOPLE WE MEET ON VACATION
